name: Mr Tubby
description:
The intention of this game was to give my Dad a gift for his birthday. He had been asking me to develop it since I began developing the game... so I did it for a special occasion!

This was also my first 3D game (with help by a fellow developer, Goest, with proficiency in 3D modelling!).

In Mr Tubby, you must fend off the menacing rubber ducks with all your power... and a water pistol. As you get more and more efficient at popping those ducks, you will earn yourself more outfits for them!

UNLOCK

Unlock up to 8 different outfits/styles for your ducky foes! Satisfy your eyeballs with beautiful (and very hot) rubber ducks.

DEFEND

Mr. Tubby is a smart man, he came prepared... with his water pistol! Use this weapon to POP those ducks out of existence.

Credit:

Goest (3D Modeller) - https://twitter.com/Goest__

Bruno (Musician/Composer) - https://twitter.com/realechostudios
